org.gridgain.grid.cache
Enum GridCachePeekMode

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<GridCachePeekMode>
      org.gridgain.grid.cache.GridCachePeekMode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<GridCachePeekMode>
public enum GridCachePeekMode
extends Enum<GridCachePeekMode>

Enumeration of all supported cache peek modes. Peek modes can be passed into various 'GridCacheProjection.peek(..)' and GridCacheEntry.peek(..) methods, such as GridCacheProjection.peek(Object, GridCachePeekMode...), GridCacheEntry.peek(GridCachePeekMode...), and others.

The following modes are supported:

  • GridCachePeekMode.TX
  • GridCachePeekMode.GLOBAL
  • GridCachePeekMode.SMART
  • GridCachePeekMode.SWAP
  • GridCachePeekMode.DB

Wiki & Forum:


Wiki
Forum

 

Enum Constant Summary
DB
          Peek value from the underlying persistent storage without loading this value into cache.
GLOBAL
          Peeks at cache global (not in-transaction) memory.
NEAR_ONLY
          Peek value from near cache only (don't peek from partitioned cache).
PARTITIONED_ONLY
          Peek value from partitioned cache only (skip near cache).
SMART
          In this mode value is peeked from in-transaction memory first using GridCachePeekMode.TX mode and then, if it has not been found there, GridCachePeekMode.GLOBAL mode is used to search in committed cached values.
SWAP
          Peeks value only from cache swap storage without loading swapped value into cache.
TX
          Peeks value only from in-transaction memory of an ongoing transaction, if any.

Enum Constant Detail

TX

public static final GridCachePeekMode TX
Peeks value only from in-transaction memory of an ongoing transaction, if any.

GLOBAL

public static final GridCachePeekMode GLOBAL
Peeks at cache global (not in-transaction) memory.

SMART

public static final GridCachePeekMode SMART
In this mode value is peeked from in-transaction memory first using GridCachePeekMode.TX mode and then, if it has not been found there, GridCachePeekMode.GLOBAL mode is used to search in committed cached values.

SWAP

public static final GridCachePeekMode SWAP
Peeks value only from cache swap storage without loading swapped value into cache.

DB

public static final GridCachePeekMode DB
Peek value from the underlying persistent storage without loading this value into cache.

NEAR_ONLY

public static final GridCachePeekMode NEAR_ONLY
Peek value from near cache only (don't peek from partitioned cache). In case of GridCacheMode.LOCAL or GridCacheMode.REPLICATED cache, behaves as GridCachePeekMode.GLOBAL mode.

PARTITIONED_ONLY

public static final GridCachePeekMode PARTITIONED_ONLY
Peek value from partitioned cache only (skip near cache). In case of GridCacheMode.LOCAL or GridCacheMode.REPLICATED cache, behaves as GridCachePeekMode.GLOBAL mode.
